item.description:
!!! Please register only if you are not attending our Friday and Saturday Program.

 

This session we talk about fall season. What a beautiful time of the year autumn is! Finger plays, songs, dances, arts and crafts and a piece of marshmallow at the end!

Read our news and see photos on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Russian-Play...

Also, find our calendar and information about our past groups here: http://www.meetup.com/Bedford-Play-Group/

 

Please, contact us at ForRussianKids@gmail.com if you have any questions or have trouble registering for the group.

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Russian Play Group: "Fall", Meet 4 (additional group)
